trans-unit.source: PHP %version% is installed, to run composer you need to PHP 5.3.4 or newer.
PHP %version% is installed, you are able to use composer.
PHP %version% is installed, you are up to date.
Composer use Namespace which are only supported in PHP 5.3 or newer. We recommend to upgrade your PHP version. The best choice is PHP 5.4 or 5.5, which are realy faster than 5.3.
You use an supported but deprecated version of PHP. We recommend to upgrade your PHP version to 5.4 or 5.5, which are realy faster than 5.3.
You use a stable, fast and maintained version of PHP. This is perfect to run composer :-)
